      Enables the Player to buy items from the merchant
      void Player.performAction(Player player)
      This method throws a SignalException which means that a trade must be initiated between the other player and this player.
      void Merchant.performAction(Player player)
      Since the merchant will always be inside the shop, this method does not do anything.

      This method attempts to add the resource into the player's pocket or bag.
      abstract void Usable.use(Player player)
      This allows the player to use the usable item.
      void Tool.use(Player player)
      This method does not do anything because when the player is collecting resources, the tool is searched on the player's pocket and a multiplier is applied.
      void Food.use(Player player)
      The player consumes the food item.
